item.description:
Read more
FREE Community Yoga Class
@ROBIN’S YOGA & HEALING LLC
885 Main Street (Route 38)
Tewksbury, Massachusetts
(978) 851-9911
website: http://www.yogawithro...

GENTLE AND RESTORATIVE-NO EXPERIENCE NECESSARY!
MEN AND WOMEN--ALL AGES WELCOME!
EVERY WEDNESDAY: 5:30-6:30PM• FREE Community Class is for everyone! It's a Foundational Beginner Class where you will be taught the details of alignment and postures. If you are budgeting, you may want to do this class one week and a regular class of your choice the next. FREE-WILL Offering is accepted. This class will be taught alternately by Michele and Robin.
item.how_to_find_us: In the Yoga Room - 2nd and 3rd door down the first hallway

group.name: Fun in So. NH and Merrimack Valley
